official_title: To amend title IV of the Medicare Catastrophic Coverage Act of 1988 with respect to the United States Bipartisan Commission on Comprehensive Health Care.

summary.text: Amends the Medicare Catastrophic Coverage Act of 1988 to make changes affecting reporting dates, printing costs, and the status of members of the United States Bipartisan Commission on Comprehensive Health Care.

titles.title: To amend title IV of the Medicare Catastrophic Coverage Act of 1988 with respect to the United States Bipartisan Commission on Comprehensive Health Care.
